client_description_Summary_Note:
Francesca Beatrice Esposito and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Rome. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.

She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
